func.title: Buy

param.name: buy_object
param.desc: Type of object to be bought.

param.name: for_player
param.desc: Owner (player number) of the new object.

param.name: pay_player
param.desc: Number of the player who pays for the object.

param.name: to_base
param.desc: Target object in which the new object is placed. This parameter can be left out if the calling object is the base.

param.name: show_errors
param.desc: If specified and not false, failure messages such as "Buying not possible" are displayed, e.g. if there is not enough money.

func.desc: Buys an object for for_plr, deducting the wealth of pay_player. The function will fail if the paying player does not have enough money or the object is currently not available in the home base material.

example.text: Buys a rock at the base of the first player.
